timeline.message: Updated project synchronization to also sync fast5 data
Updated test for syncing fast5 data to project
Merged dev and fixed merge conflicts

timeline.bodyText: Note the try/catch around this block in the assemblies section below.  It should be added in case the host system doesn't support fast5 data.
timeline.author: tom114

timeline.bodyText: This whole section is exactly the same for single end and fast5 files, and nearly the same for pairs.  Want to encapsulate it into a private method that can be called here and in those other file types?
timeline.author: tom114

replies.bodyText: Yup that was a good idea. Added in ccf8d68
replies.author: deepsidhu85

timeline.message: Added try/catch when attempting to get fast5 file data from remote installation. Updated docs. Added a private method to to sync the sequencing object to a local installation which is used by sequencefilepair, singleendsequencfile, and fast5object
Updated user docs. Updated sequencefilepair, singleendsequencefiles, and fast5object to pass the remote status to the syncSequencingObject as we already retrieved it.
Merged dev and fixed merge conflicts
